text: Preheat the oven to 450 °F (232 °C). Line a baking sheet. Put the flour, baking powder, sugar, baking soda, and salt into a large mixing bowl. Stir together well. Add the margarine. Rub into the dry mixture with your fingertips. Keep rubbing until it resembles fine breadcrumbs. Add the yogurt and stir until a soft dough forms.  Remove the dough and place on a floured work surface. Pat down gently into a 1/2" thick square. Use a round cookie cutter or a bowl mouth to cut four rounds from the dough. Put these on the prepared baking sheet and cut another four rounds from the remaining dough pieces patted back together. Place in the oven and bake for 9 - 10 minutes, or until the tops turn golden.  Remove from the oven and allow to cool on a cooling rack.  Prepare the filling by mixing together the strawberries, lemon juice and sugar in a small bowl.  Split the shortcakes in half. Place base down on plates. Add the filling over each shortcake evenly. Add a swirl of whipped vegan soy cream. Cover with the top half of the shortcake. They are now ready to serve.
